full_summary:
### Metal Storage Pallet Warehouse Racking Contract
#### Solicitation Information

* **Solicitation Number**: WS4338143586
* **Date Published**: January 2, 2024
* **Closing Date**: January 17, 2024, 2:00 PM EST
* **Tender Status**: **Cancelled**

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is soliciting proposals for the procurement of metal storage pallet warehouse racking services for the Department of National Defence (DND) at North Bay, Ontario.

#### Procurement Details

The successful bidder will be required to provide steel framework, new industrial building and warehousing construction services, structural steel erection services, and palletized cargo storage solutions.

The procurement will be subject to the **Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)** and will be open to submission from qualified suppliers.

#### Selection Criteria

The selection of the successful bidder will be based on the **lowest price**.

#### Contact Information

For more information, please contact:

* Jessica Canas, PSPC
* Telephone: None
* Email: <jessica.canas@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca>
* Notice URL: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18404193?extsite=MTg0MDQxOTNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

#### End User Details

The end-user for this procurement is the Department of National Defence (DND), located at:

* 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0K2, Canada
